title: 15 Reformation Pieces That Will Bring Your Fall Vision Board to Life
description: Reformation is a brand that's hard not to know. The sustainable Los Angeles-based fashion label is adored by the likes of Kendall Jenner, Meghan Markle, and Taylor Swift - along with countless others, including PS editors, and most likely, you. The brand's repertoire isn't known for just one thing. While its dresses are the ultimate fan-favorite, Reformation's influence stretches far beyond that, with must haves in every category, from tops and bottoms to footwear, accessories, and recently, for the first time ever, jewelry. But with price tags that mostly land in the three dollar sign-range, a full Reformation shopping spree isn't always realistic. That's why we're all about choosing the right pieces and why we've curated this guide to the brand's bestsellers for every Reformation lover, new or seasoned. Ahead, we've rounded up the 15 best Reformation pieces to consider coveting for fall, from everyday dresses that'll take you from the office to happy hour and wedding guest dresses to tops that are perfect for layering and stylish denim. We even included options at a range of price points, along with PS editor favorites, styles in trending prints, and more. Keep scrolling to shop our selects. Related: I Tried the Kacey Musgraves x Reformation Bunny Dress Everybody Wants
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: We curated a shopping guide to the best Reformation pieces of the season.

html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Reformation is a brand that's hard not to know. The sustainable Los Angeles-based fashion label is adored by the likes of Kendall Jenner, Meghan Markle, and Taylor Swift — along with countless others, including PS editors, and most likely, you. The brand's repertoire isn't known for just one thing. While its dresses are the ultimate fan-favorite, Reformation's influence stretches far beyond that, with must haves in every category, from tops and bottoms to footwear, accessories, and recently, for the first time ever, jewelry. But with price tags that mostly land in the three dollar sign-range, a full Reformation shopping spree isn't always realistic. That's why we're all about choosing the right pieces and why we've curated this guide to the brand's bestsellers for every Reformation lover, new or seasoned.

Ahead, we've rounded up the 15 best Reformation pieces to consider coveting for fall, from everyday dresses that'll take you from the office to happy hour and wedding guest dresses to tops that are perfect for layering and stylish denim. We even included options at a range of price points, along with PS editor favorites, styles in trending prints, and more. Keep scrolling to shop our selects.

Best Knit Top From Reformation

Reformation Dusk Knit Top ($58)

This sleeveless fitted knit top is the kind of wardrobe staple you'll want in every color. It boasts lightweight, stretchy fabric that pairs perfectly with everything, from baggy jeans to skirts and beyond.

Best Swimsuit From Reformation

Reformation Verne Bikini Top ($98) and Reformation Faro Bikini Bottom ($88)

Reformation revamped its swimwear line earlier this year, and PS editors were among the first to test them out. While all pieces in the collection are covetable for any vacations you're taking this fall or winter, this one stands out for its chic, retro-inspired design. Check this one out and more in our Reformation swimwear Vetted feature.

Editor Quote: "As a city girl, I take my beach days seriously. I typically like to spend hours by the water, so my swimwear has to be comfortable to lay and tan in all day, and hold up for frequent dips in the ocean. This retro-inspired swim set passed the test and more, making it one of my favorite pieces of swimwear to date. The brand's new eco fabric felt both soft and stretchy, and the halter neckline made the suit very sunbathing-friendly, though it's worth noting it may lack support for those with larger chests (it has no underwire or molded cups). It also changed my mind about swim bottoms — I usually prefer a high-cut style, but I found these boy shorts to be so flattering and fun." — Yerin Kim, editor, Features

Best Going-Out Top From Reformation

Reformation Melanie Top ($148)

We probably don't need to tell you how obsession-worthy this top is. Whether you're wearing it on a date night or out dancing with friends, it's guaranteed to turn heads and spark questions about where you got it. It comes in neutrals like the black and white option pictured here, as well as more colorful ones like this light blue style ($148).

Best Earrings From Reformation

Reformation x Clare Waight Keller Bechet Earrings ($168)

Reformation just dropped its first-ever limited-edition, vintage-inspired jewelry collection, created in collaboration with fashion designer Clare Waight Keller. These sleek silver huggie hoops with bold geometric links are one of our favorites from the collection, and they come in gold ($168) as well, if that's more your style.

Best Cashmere Sweater From Reformation

Reformation Cashmere Boyfriend Sweater ($168)

If you're ready to invest in a cashmere sweater for fall or winter, you can't go wrong with this Reformation bestseller. It's soft, lightweight, boasts a relaxed fit, and comes in both solids and stripes. We love that it's made from 95 percent recycled cashmere, too. What's not to love?

Best Cardigan From Reformation

Reformation Clara Cashmere Crew Cardigan ($198)

This classically chic cardigan comes in a rainbow of colors, including neutrals and bolder hues. And like the aforementioned boyfriend sweater, it's made from 95 percent recycled cashmere with a relaxed fit.

Best Denim Dress From Reformation

Reformation Kendi Denim Midi Dress ($218)

Narrowing down the best of Reformation's iconic dresses is no easy task, but this denim midi stands out for fall. Teamed with a belt, boots, and your favorite handbag, it's without a doubt double take-worthy.

Best Puff-Sleeved Dress From Reformation

Reformation x Kacey Musgraves Bunny Dress ($248)

Our associate director confessed that she hadn't yet embraced the English countryside-inspired "pouf sleeves and doily trims" vibe until she tried this dress from the Kacey Musgraves x Reformation collection. Spoiler: It didn't disappoint. And clearly, she's not alone; hundreds (if not thousands) of others scooped it up when it first sold out. The good news is it's back stock (at least, at the time of writing), and you can read all about it in our review of the Bunny Dress.

Editor Quote: "While I've never bought a dress that made me think of frolicking in the meadow (what meadow?), Musgraves's on-screen look was so appealing, I knew I wanted to put my personal touch on it and try to make it my own. What happened when I actually got my hands on the Bunny mini and tried it on surprised me even more. Not only did I feel comfortable enough to embrace my girlier, dare I say demure-leaning, side, I also accessorized with frilly socks and Mary-Janes, a nod to Musgraves's iconic campaign." — Sarah Wasilak, associate content director, Shopping

Best Special Occasion Dress From Reformation

Reformation Bryson Dress ($248)

If you need a special occasion dress, rest assured that Reformation has you covered. While you could easily spend an afternoon scrolling through all of the brand's elegant options, this beauty is a standout with its fitted bodice and A-line skirt. It's available in this eye-catching shade of cherry red and three floral prints.

Best Suede Bag From Reformation

Reformation Medium Patrizia Bag ($448)

Suede and fall go hand in hand, and this brown structured bowling bag is certainly no exception. It has silver hardware, a card holder, and zippered closure, but if that doesn't sound like enough room, there's a bigger version, too: the Oversized Patrizia Bag ($598). It's big enough to store a laptop and more.

Best Riding Boots From Reformation

Reformation Frances Knee High Boot ($498)

There's no rule saying you need to live anywhere near horses to rock a pair of riding boots (and honestly, you wouldn't want to wear these ones for that). These ones have a square toe, block heel, and knee-high height that will look so chic paired with a sweater minidress.

Best Leather Jacket From Reformation

Reformation Veda Bennett Oversized Leather Bomber ($658)

It's no secret that this leather jacket is quite the splurge, but it's the kind of piece you'll hold onto (and wear) forever. It's made of soft sheep leather and has distressed detailing that gives it a cool, lived-in look and adds an edge to all your ensembles.

Marisa Petrarca is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has more than five years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. Her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, and InStyle, among others
